conbody.p: In this project, I have copied the first 21 pages of IBM StoredIQ Deployment and Configuration Guide for XML learning purposes for the module XML in Technical Communication at the CIT.

p.b: Notes that ust be taken into account for the project:

ul.li: I used the most appropiate Dita elements for the content given. However, instead of using the element Shortdesc, I preferred to use Abstract to avoid the text from appearing in the front page of the WebHelp Responsive transformation.
The metadata and the and the conditional processing files were made for training purposes and not for real consumption of the document.
I used basic metadata in images, tables and topics
I used Conkeyref to reuse content such as images, and tables.
I created a Glossary and an Index.
I created 5 basic filters using condicional processing profiles.
I groupd the topics hierarchically, using the default relational links given by Oxygen, as they seemed to make more sense.
